parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.

parameters.name: DryRun
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to perform only a dry run. Valid values:

*   true: performs only a dry run. The system checks the request for potential issues, including invalid AccessKey pairs, unauthorized Resource Access Management (RAM) users, and missing parameter values. Otherwise, an error message is returned. If the request passes the dry run, the `DryRunOperation` error code is returned.
*   false: performs a dry run and performs the actual request. If the request passes the dry run, a 2xx HTTP status code is returned and the operation is performed.

Default value: false.

parameters.name: PtpStatus
parameters.description:
PTP status value. Valid values:

*   enabled
*   disabled

Default value: disabled.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
